comment.text: The production of the second messenger molecules diacylglycerol (DAG) and inositol 1,4,5-trisphosphate (IP3) is mediated by activated phosphatidylinositol-specific phospholipase C enzymes.
Interacts with SHANK2 (By similarity). Interacts with LPAR2.

property.value: Synthesis of IP3 and IP4 in the cytosol
G beta:gamma signalling through PLC beta
Fatty Acids bound to GPR40 (FFAR1) regulate insulin secretion
Expressed in duodenum and 195 other tissues
P:regulation of systemic arterial blood pressure
P:Wnt signaling pathway, calcium modulating pathway
